FuncDef: This command designates a local router DHCPv6 server for local pools management where IPv6 prefixes or address for PPPoXv6 clients or IPoEv6 clients are allocated without the need for the internal router DHCP relay-agent. Those addresses are tied to PPPoX or IPoE sessions and they are de-allocated when the PPPoX or IPoE session is terminated.

ParaDef.Info: The name of the local router DHCPv6 server.
